about.heading: About us
about.description:
Oasis mission is to provide the best and most trusted entry point to deploy your capital. We are building Oasis.app to let our users benefit from all of the potential in DeFi.

 Our team is made of passionate thinkers and builders.

careers.no-positions-you-like: You haven't found something that you like? Show us your interest, we are always looking for the best talents to join us!

warnings.potential-generate-amount-less-than-debt: 初次开启金库最低需要生成 {{debtFloor}} Dai。请添加更多抵押品生成 {{debtFloor}} Dai。
warnings.debt-is-less-than-debt-floor: 你当前借出的 Dai 低于最低限额  {{debtFloor}} Dai。你至少需要借出最低借 Dai 额度。
warnings.vault-will-be-at-risk-level-danger: 当前操作会让你的金库抵押率非常接近最低要求。
warnings.vault-will-be-at-risk-level-danger-at-ne: 当前操作会让你的金库抵押率在下次喂价更新的时候非常接近最低要求。

errors.payback-amount-exceeds-vault-debt: 你希望偿还的金额超出了该金库借 Dai 数量。
errors.debt-will-be-less-than-debt-floor: Maker 金库的最低借贷金额要么为零或者高于 {{debtFloor}} Dai。请调整你的偿还数量。
errors.custom-collateral-allowance-amount-excee: 许可额度过大，请降低自定义许可数量。

errors.depositing-all-eth-balance: 你需要留一些 ETH 支付 Gas 费用，请降低你的存入数量。
